ValidationRule.description: Validate if there are duplicate values on Costs (at BG level and BU level) if calculated automatically - March 2021
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( PSR_Automatically_Calc_Estimated_Cost__c, OR( PSR_Cost_BG_NI__c == PSR_Cost_BG_MN__c, PSR_Cost_BG_NI__c == PSR_Cost_BG_CNS__c, PSR_Cost_BG_CNS__c == PSR_Cost_BG_MN__c, PSR_Cost_BU_NI_FN__c == PSR_Cost_BU_NI_IPRTG__c, PSR_Cost_BU_NI_FN__c == PSR_Cost_BU_NI_OPTICS__c, PSR_Cost_BU_NI_IPRTG__c == PSR_Cost_BU_NI_OPTICS__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Sales Value BGs/BUs you entered leads to a Double cost
